data.title: ART OF ITALICUS 2024 APERITIVO CHALLENGE - NATIONAL FINALISTS ANNOUNCED!
data.meta_description: ITALICUS ROSOLIO DI BERGAMOTTO ANNOUNCE NATIONAL FINALISTS FOR THE ART OF ITALICUS 2024 APERITIVO CHALLENGE ITALICUS Rosolio di... Read More
data.text:
ITALICUS ROSOLIO DI BERGAMOTTO ANNOUNCE NATIONAL FINALISTS FOR THE ART OF ITALICUS 2024 APERITIVO CHALLENGE

ITALICUS Rosolio di Bergamotto and its partners announce the country finalists for the 6th Edition of the Art of ITALICUS – Aperitivo Challenge.

A program cherished by bartenders for its emphasis on creativity and innovation, this competition invites bartenders globally to craft an original aperitivo-style cocktail, drawing inspiration from any form of ART.

The finalists from each of the countries can be found below:

Samo Simjanovski | Kavarna Moderna | Ljubljana

Wild Card

The winner of the Wild Card will be announced after all the National finals, mid-April 2024.

Grazie to all who took part in the challenge this year and BUONA FORTUNA to all finalists competing for the National finals.

We look forward to seeing all National Bar Artists at the Global Finals in Rome on the 12th of May 2024.

Salute!

#Italicus #ArtofItalicus #AOI24
